form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION FOR ISSUANCE OR EXTENSION OF PERMIT TO REENTER THE UNITED STATES, F-131

full_text: UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE Form approved. Immigration and Naturalization Service OMB No 43-R0052. FEE STAMP APPLICATION FOR ISSUANCE OR EXTENSION OF PERMIT TO REENTER THE UNITED STATES 76-1396-5 as provided in section 223 of the Lawn Immigration and Nationality Act Use typewriter or print in block letters with ball-point pen. Date 1/24/20 to Reenter the Terified by Jet D issuance I hereby apply for (check one) of Permit United States extension m CHECKED FAMILY NAME (Capital Letters) FIRST MIDDLE 1. YOUR NAME IMPORTANT: You must submit your Alien Registration Receipt Wu CHI-SU LIANG Card with this application if you checked 'Issuance'' above. C/O IN CARE OF DR JULIAN J. Wu If you checked Extension'' you must submit the reentry per- mit you wish to have extended. (No. and Street) (Apt. No.) MAILING ADDRESS 4 SAGE HILL LANE ALIEN REGISTRATION NUMBER IN U.S. (City) (State) (ZIP Code) MENANDS N.Y. 12204 19 320 867 FILL IN ITEMS 2 THROUGH 6 ONLY IF APPLICATION IS FOR ISSUANCE OF REENTRY PERMIT 2. DATE OF BIRTH(Month, Day, Yeary COUNTRY OF BIRTH COUNTRY OF CLAIMED NATIONALITY COLOR OF EYES COLOR OF HAIR 2-8-14 China Republic of China/Taiwan) Brown Black HEIGHT FEET INCHES VISIBLE MARKS AND SCARS none Dark 3. DID DID NOT REGISTER FOR SELECTIVE SERVICE 4. FILL IN THE ITEMS IN THIS BLOCK AS TO first ARRIVAL IN UNITED STATES FOR PERMANENT RESIDENCE OR ADJUSTMENT TO PERMANENT RESIDENT STATUS NAME UNDER WHICH ADMITTED OR ADJUSTED PORT OF ARRIVAL OR LOCATION OF DATE OF ARRIVAL OR DATE AS OF Wu, CHI-SU LIANG IMMIGRATION OFFICE WHICH WHICH ADJUSTMENT OF STATUS GRANTED ADJUSTMENT WAS Albany N.Y. 01-02-74 GRANTED 2/21/74 FILL IN REMAINING ITEMS IN THIS BLOCK ONLY IF YOU DID NOT ACQUIRE PERMANENT RESIDENCE THROUGH ADJUSTMENT. MANNER OF FIRST ARRIVAL IN UNITED STATES FOR PERMANENT RESIDENCE (Name of Vessel, Airline, etc.) FATHER'S NAME AT TIME OF YOUR ARRIVAL MOTHER'S MAIDEN NAME 5. FILL IN THE ITEMS IN THIS BLOCK AS TO last ARRIVAL IN U.S. (Exclude any re-entry after an absence of less than six months in Canada or Mexico.) NAME UNDER WHICH ADMITTED PORT OF ARRIVAL DATE OF ARRIVAL Wu , CHI -SU LIANG SAN FRANCISCO CA 9-14-75 NAME OF VESSEL, AIRLINE OR OTHER MEANS OF CONVEYANCE: 6. PORT OF proposed DEPARTURE FROM UNITED STATES DATE OF proposed DEPARTURE LENGTH OF INTENDED ABSENCE ABROAD L.A. CA. 2-20-76 / year NAME OF TRANSPORTATION COMPANY IF DEPARTURE IS TO BE BY VESSEL, GIVE NAME OF VESSEL CAT Chinese Air Transportation Co.) FILL IN ITEM 7, ONLY IF APPLICATION IS FOR EXTENSION OF REENTRY PERMIT 7. List all countries visited since your last departure from the United States, in the order visited DATE & PORT OF LAST DEPARTURE FROM U.S. TAIWANCRepublic of China) 4-16-74, L.A., CA. 02 HIBE CHICH 8. FILL IN ITEM 8 ONLY IF YOU HAVE PREVIOUSLY OBTAINED A PERMIT TO REENTER ISSUANCE DATE OF LAST PERMIT LOCATION OF IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION OFFICE ISSUING LAST PERMIT MY LAST PERMIT (City and State) IS ATTACHED 4-5-74 Albony, N.Y. IS NOT ATTACHED IF THE PERMIT IS NOT ATTACHED, STATE REASON IF PERMIT IS ATTACHED, STATE EXPIRATION DATE Submitted in to the Immigration Officer an last arrival. ALL APPLICANTS MUST FILL IN ITEMS 9 THROUGH 20, INCLUSIVE 9. PRESENT OCCUPATION: NAME and ADDRESS OF EMPLOYER none SOCIAL SECURITY ACCOUNT NUMBER 388-70-9424 10. MAILING ADDRESS ABROAD (Number and Street) (City/Town) (State/Province/District) (Country) 20-2 LANE 44 KIMEN ST. TAIPEI TAIWAN REPUBLIC OF CHINA 11. COUNTRIES TO BE VISITED (List each country) TAIWAN 12. REASONS FOR GOING ABROAD OR SEEKING EXTENSION (Be concise and complete): VISITING WITH HUSBAND AND TAKING CARE OF PERSONAL BUSSINESS RECEIVED TRANS IN RET'D TRANS. OUT COMPLETED FORM 1-131 (REV. 6-1-73) N OVER 2/4/76 2/10/76
